ValidationRule.description: NICC-01946 Prevents the Public Status Description field from being changed on CRs that do not have a Product Group of "PMS" .originally created for the Breda Office while they are not integrated to TFS.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( AND( ISNEW(),Product_Group__r.Name != "PMS", NOT(ISBLANK(Public_Status_Description__c)), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Username, "suser@newmarketinc.com")) ) ) || ( AND( ISCHANGED(Public_Status_Description__c), Product_Group__r.Name != "PMS", NOT(CONTAINS($User.Username, "suser@newmarketinc.com")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to change the Public Status Description of this CR
